title: Video: Leah Lind-White Rips All Night On Kona Honzo ESD
content:
Work all day, party all night? That’s the formula as Leah Lind-White pulls an all-nighter with a self-aware Kona Honzo ESD. If you’re interested in the bike, it’s got a steel frame with wicked-cool violet metal flake paint, a Marzocchi Bomber Z1 fork with 150mm of travel, 4-piston brakes, and Maxxis rubber. The finishing move?

The post Video: Leah Lind-White Rips All Night On Kona Honzo ESD appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
